constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 11 (Tuesday, January 18, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. WAGNER:
H.R. 6420.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3
Article I, Section 8, Clause 10
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18
Amendment XIII (relating to slavery and involuntary
servitude)
[Page H216]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

title: Sex Trafficking Demand Reduction Act
